fixes.name: cheap ?
fixes.dax_expression: IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread] < - SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As]), "cheap", "GC")
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF expression to DAX IF. Replaced [Coll Spread] with 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Coll Spread]. Replaced [Parameters].[Specials spread] with SELECTEDVALUE('Specials spread'[Display As]) as required for parameters. Preserved the negation before the parameter and the string outputs ("cheap", "GC").
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
